Text.val: 06.06.2014 SH SCR18936 Changed OPH106C.PI.BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER = 0 into = BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER
11.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
13.04.2010 GB SCR15439 Rebuilt task of selection into SQL

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BADT_NFPR_NO, BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT, BADT_BANK_ADMNO, BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO, BADT_BANKID, BADT_BANKACCOUNT, BADT_IBAN, BADT_BANK_CURRENCY, BNKA_NAME, BADT_MUTDAILYSTATEMENTS, BADT_NPAYMENTS, BADT_DAILYRUNNUMBER from :1/BADT, :1/BNKA where BADT_NFPR_NO = :2 and BADT_BANK_ADMNO = BNKA_BANK_ADMNO and BADT_BANK_LEDG_NO = BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO and BADT_BANKID = BNKA_BANKID and BADT_BANKACCOUNT = BNKA_BANKACCOUNT order by BADT_BANKID, BADT_BANKACCOUNT, BADT_DATDAILYSTATEMENT for fetch only
